021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.maps.MapKey;
022import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
023
024/**
025 * Represents the status of an {@link Account accout}. The  account status affects things such as
026 * using the balance and receiving payments.
027 *
028 * @author creatorfromhell
029 * @see Account
030 * @since 0.1.2.0
031 */
032public interface AccountStatus {
033
034  /**
035   * @return The identifier of this account status.
036   */
037  @MapKey
038  @NotNull
039  String identifier();
040
041  /**
042   * Whether this status can be unlocked by entering the account's pin.
043   *
044   * @return True if this status can be unlocked by entering the account's pin, otherwise false.
045   */
046  boolean unlockable();
047
048  /**
049   * Whether the account may use money from their account.
050   *
051   * @return True if the account is able to use funds from its balance, otherwise false.
052   */
053  boolean use();
054
055  /**
056   * Whether the account may receive money into their account.
057   *
058   * @return True if the account is able to receive funds into its balance, otherwise false.
059   */
060  boolean receive();
061
062}
